idea-plugin.name: GALA
idea-plugin.description:
Support for GALA language (Go Alternative LAnguage). GALA is a modern programming language that transpiles to Go, combining Go's efficiency with features from Scala and other functional languages:
  • Immutability by default (val/var)
  • Pattern matching with extractors and guards
  • Expression-oriented (if/match as expressions)
  • Lambda expressions with => syntax
  • Generics and type inference
  • Option, Either, and Tuple monads
Features:
  • Syntax highlighting for keywords, types, strings, comments, operators
  • Code completion for keywords, built-in types, and standard library types
  • Brace matching and folding
  • Comment/uncomment support (// and /* */)
  • Structure view
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.1.0
  • Added support for multi-line comments (/* */)
  • Added support for raw strings (backticks)
  • Added highlighting for built-in types (int, string, bool, etc.)
  • Added new keywords: break, continue, defer, go, select, switch, default, map, chan
  • Added completion for standard library types (Option, Either, Tuple, List, Array)
  • Improved operator recognition (++, --, +=, ..., <-, etc.)
1.0.0
  • Initial release of GALA language support
